description: EX2 is a new maker space and centre for sustainable innovation in Park Royal. The building will be opening up its doors giving an insight into the workshops, artist studios, 3D printing and sustainable design housed within its walls.

events.name: Drop in: Open Studios
events.notes: Please let us know if you plan to visit. Doing so allows the venue to plan ahead and you will be notified by email about any changes to the programme that might affect your visit.

factsheet.heading: EX2 and Park Royal Design District
paragraphs:
EX2 is part of the creative district in Park Royal. An area known for being a noisy industrial estate has emerged in recent years as one of London's most interesting spaces for art, creative design, sustainable innovation and more. 
For the weekend 14th -15th September, the area will be opening the doors to its creative maker spaces and artist studios that are normally kept private. 
Full information on the programme including open studios, workshops, exhibitions and talks, can be found at  https://www.parkroyaldesigndistrict.com/.

travel_info: Tube: Harlesden, North Acton, Willesden Junction

name: EX2
